scripts.cypress: cd server && npm run knex seed:run && cd ../client && npm run test:integration
scripts.dev: concurrently -n graphql,server,client -c magenta.bold,green.bold,cyan.bold npm:dev:gql npm:dev:server npm:dev:client
scripts.dev:client: npm run wait:client && cd client && npm run dev
scripts.dev:server: npm run wait:server && cd server && npm run dev
scripts.format:client: cd client && npm run format && npm run format:package
scripts.format:gql: cd graphql && npm run format && npm run format:package
scripts.format:server: cd server && npm run format && npm run format:package
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd server && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd graphql && npm ci --only=production && npm run generate && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.start: concurrently -n graphql,server,client -c magenta.bold,green.bold,cyan.bold npm:start:gql npm:start:server npm:start:client
scripts.start:client: npm run wait:client && cd client && npm start
scripts.start:server: npm run wait:server && cd server && npm start
